manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We tested most games on these systems. The following is the testing results of the games for reference: PC: For Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5 PS2: For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith, Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2,Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5 PS3: For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith, Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2, Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5

Wii: For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith, Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2, Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5, Boogie Superstar, U-sing, Grease, Robbie Williams, Glee, SingStar, We Sing Robbie Williams, Karaoke Joysound, American Idol Encore, Def Jam Rapstar, Karaoke Revolution, Sing It, Joysound. Xbox 360: For Guitar Hero World Tour, Guitar Hero Encore: Rocks the 80s, Guitar Hero Smash Hits, Guitar Hero Aerosmith , Guitar Hero Metallica, Guitar Hero Van Halen, Rock Band 2, Rock Band, LEGO Rock Band, Rock Band 1, Guitar Hero 5, Lips: I Love The 80s

IMPORTANT: You have to set the microphone device in the console/game setting before use. Or it may not work. For PS4: Setting > Devices > Audio Devices > Input Device For Xbox 360: Setting > Preference > Voice > Play through Both For Xbox One: Setting > All Setting > Display & Sound > Volume > Party Chat Output > Headset & Speaker Package Includes: 1 x TPFOON Wired Microphone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This worked great for our PS4 Rockband 4 game. The only thing I should mention is that it works on top of the other microphone that comes with the game set up. So there is no separate grading that the game creates with having a 2nd mic connected but the review is on how well it works and yes it did work and it was a little louder in volume that. The original. Perfect for what I wanted. More players could play!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for Guitar Hero on the Wii
reviews.reviewText: Super easy and worked well on our Wii to sing along with Guitar Hero.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for karaoke
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter to use with an Xbox karaoke game and they work well. The only small complaint would be that when starting the game sometimes the mics need to be pulled out and plugged back in for the console to recognize them. They're fairly inexpensive with a long cord and do their job well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought it because it said could be for Wii but it didn't work on my Wii and I wasn't able to use it and to me it was not specific information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new microphone that would work with my Rock Band game on the Wii and this worked perfectly and seems like good quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of Junk
reviews.reviewText: It stopped working within a week of using it.

reviews.reviewTitle: The microphone arrived very quickly, and works well with ...
reviews.reviewText: The microphone arrived very quickly, and works well with my Xbox one. It seems to come back through the tv much louder than the one that came with rock band 4, but personally I am a fan of this. There is a bit of reverb, but it only makes the cheesy karaoke nights that much more legit.
Shipped fast. Got it the next day and was very happy that I can use it on my PS4 with no problems. There was no need to install anything as the system recognized it for Sing Star and Let's Sing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pas par en avant, juste par en arrière...
reviews.reviewText: Il marche très bien mais je dois passer par en arrière. Si je le branche dans un des Port USB à l'avant du Playstation 4, il n'est pas reconnu. Par contre, en le branchant dans le Port USB du derrière de mon Playstation, ça marche! J'en voulais deux pour Rockband mais, deux ne marcheraient pas car il y a pas deux trous en arrière...
Bought it for my Nintendo Switch. I put NS on the dock and connect it to the TV, which output sound to my sound bar system. This USB mic let me to talk to my friends in Fortnite and works very well.
Not bad but the sound is a little off it echos what you sing. Slightly disappointed. Will be looking for a better mic.
